Autoencoder.name: Autoencoder
Autoencoder.description: The Autoencoder class contains all the necessary logic to train data for multiclass classification using single layer Autoencoder.

params.name: args
params.description: Contains all the necessary parameters for the Autoencoder as listed below.

props.name: path
props.description: optional Path to save the weights.

props.name: regularization_parameter
props.description: Optional regularization parameter to prevent overfitting.

props.name: notify_count
props.description: Optional value to execute the iteration_callback after every x number of iterations.

props.name: iteration_callback
props.description: Optional callback that can be used for getting cost and iteration value on every notify count.

props.name: hiddenLayerSize
props.description: Optional value for number of hidden layer units.

props.name: maximum_iterations
props.description: Optional maximum iterations to be allowed before the optimization is complete.

props.name: optimization_mode
props.description: Optional optimzation(gradient descent) mode. For batch gradient descent optimization_mode =  {'mode': 0} and for mini-batch gradient descent optimization_mode =  {'mode': 1, 'batch_size': (specify  required size) }.

classitems.description: This method returns all the parameters passed to the constructor.
classitems.name: getInitParams

classitems.description: This method serves as the logic for the sigmoid function.
classitems.name: sigmoid

params.name: z
params.description: The matrix to be used as the input for the sigmoid function.

return.description: Returns the elementwise sigmoid of the input matrix.

classitems.description: This method is responsible for the forwardPropagation in the Autoencoder.
classitems.name: forwardPropagation

params.name: X
params.description: The input matrix representing the features.

params.name: W1
params.description: The matrix representing the weights for layer 1.

params.name: W2
params.description: The matrix representing the weights for layer 2.

return.description: Returns the resultant ouput of forwardPropagation.

classitems.description: This method is responsible for calculating the Kullback-Leibler sum in the Autoencoder.
classitems.name: kullback_leibler_sum

classitems.description: This method serves as the logic for the sigmoid function derivative.
classitems.name: sigmoid_Derivative

params.name: z
params.description: The matrix to be used as the input for the sigmoid function derivative.

return.description: Returns the elementwise sigmoid derivative of the input matrix.

classitems.description: This method is responsible for the costFunction, i.e. error.
classitems.name: costFunction

params.name: X
params.description: The input matrix representing the features.

params.name: Y
params.description: The output matrix corresponding to training data.

params.name: algorithm_mode
params.description: The current algorithm mode (testing: 2, crossvalidating: 1, training: 0).

classitems.description: This method is responsible for the costFunction_Derivative, i.e. gradient of error with respect to weights.
classitems.name: costFunction_Derivative

params.name: X
params.description: The input matrix representing the features.

params.name: Y
params.description: The output matrix corresponding to training data.

params.name: W1
params.description: The matrix representing the weights for layer 1.

params.name: W2
params.description: The matrix representing the weights for layer 2.

return.description: Returns the resultant gradients with respect to layer 1: dJdW1 and layer 2: dJdW2 of the Autoencoder.

classitems.description: This method is responsible for saving the trained weights of the Autoencoder to text files at specified path.
classitems.name: saveWeights

params.name: weights
params.description: The weights of the layer1 and layer2 of the Autoencoder.

params.name: path
params.description: The path at wich the weights are to be saved.

return.description: Returns true after succesfuly saving the weights.

classitems.description: This method is responsible for the optimization of weights, i.e. BackPropagation algorithm.
classitems.name: gradientDescent

params.name: X
params.description: The input matrix representing the features.

params.name: Y
params.description: The output matrix corresponding to training data.

params.name: W1
params.description: The matrix representing the weights for layer 1.

params.name: W2
params.description: The matrix representing the weights for layer 2.

return.description: Returns a resolved promise with iteration and cost data on successful completion of optimization.

classitems.description: This method is responsible for creating layers and initializing random weights.
classitems.name: train_network

params.name: X
params.description: The input matrix representing the features of the training set.

params.name: Y
params.description: The output matrix corresponding to training set data.

return.description: Returns a resolved promise with iteration and cost data on successful completion of optimization.

classitems.description: This contains logic to predict result for a given input after training on data.
classitems.name: predict_result

params.name: X
params.description: The input matrix representing the features.

return.description: Returns the resultant matrix after performing forwardPropagation on saved weights.

classitems.description: This method is responsible for setting weights of the Autoencoder from a specified path.
classitems.name: setWeights

params.name: path
params.description: The path where the trained weights are to be found.

return.description: Returns a resolved promise after successfuly setting weights.
